titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a new community-based outpatient clinic at Ord Military Community, California.
To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a new community-based outpatient clinic at Ord Military Community, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a new community-based outpatient clinic at the Ord Military Community, California.
Makes such construction subject to: (1) the completion of a feasibility study; and (2) the availability of appropriations.
